name: Ragtag Racing
description:
Ragtag Racing is a simple (and hopefully fun) 3D racing game which tries to celebrate the historic vehicles of motorsport along with the mayhem and perils that came with driving them.
Race from last place to a podium position to increase your score and progress to the next track in each series.
Stay out of trouble and don't loose momentum, use your boost to get ahead of the pack but make sure you don't run out of fuel.
